column4: i have an ati readon 9200se video card, when i first installed unbuntu 9.04 i could use 2048x1024 resolution on one monitor, i did all the updates and now i can only go as high as 1024x768 and i cant figure out how to get it back to at least the 2048, and i'd like to get back to dual monitor. can anyone help me
What is the output of xrandr -q?
This command lists what the video card is capable of doing with the driver currently loaded.
ok, hold on let me check, im totally brand new to this
NP!  (when you say something start with my name like I am doing for you).
the driver says max 1024x768
What card do you have?

ati raedon 9200se
